Billions of dollars in power sales, new  generation and existing assets will be impacted by the spread of capacity  markets across the US  — do you understand the rules well enough to make the right moves?.




Media Sponsors:












Put your toughest  technical questions to the experts who design the markets and set the rules.
Learn from electric distribution companies  and merchant generators how they view the new capacity markets.
Assess the expected impact of the RPM,  Demand Curve, and FCM on the amount and type of new generation and the value of  generation assets.
Make the best siting, technology type, and  buy/sell decisions in light of nuances in the market rules, auction mechanics,  and penalties for nonperformance.
Gauge the impacts of  capacity congestion and locational differences on physical vs. financial  arrangements.
Consider the impact of major new transmission  projects on capacity values by location, risk, and seams resolution between  neighboring ISOs.
What you need to know to optimize power  sales into regions with active capacity markets.
